availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Whitstone, Whitley County, KY. A farmer. Born in Kentucky, son of John Tye. (1860 census: age 40, so born c1820. But 1870 census gives age as 43, so born c1827. I split the difference to calculate birth date as c1823).

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Whitstone, p. 23.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Whitley County, Boston Precinct, p. 25.
